titleStmt.title: A Neural Network that Learns to Interpret Myocardial Planar Thallium Scintigrams

affiliation.orgName: Department of Cardiology Sapir Medical Center
Department of Biophysics and Nuclear Medicine Hadassah Medical Center Jerusalem

analytic.title: A Neural Network that Learns to Interpret Myocardial Planar Thallium Scintigrams

abstract.p: The planar thallium-201 myocardial perfusion scintigram is a widely used diagnostic technique for detecting and estimating the risk of coronary artery disease. Neural networks learned to interpret 100 thallium scinti-grams as determined by individual expert ratings. Standard error back-propagation was compared to standard LMS, and LMS combined with one layer of RBF units. Using the "leave-one-out" method, generalization was tested on all 100 cases. Training time was determined automatically from cross-validation perfonnance. Best perfonnance was attained by the RBF/LMS network with three hidden units per view and compares favorably with human experts.
